list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Added sand floor
Changed shadows to allow drawing on sand floor
Fixed fish behavior
Redesigned Fish class and subclasses
Added several sound effects (CREDITS IN README)
Added death from starvation TODO: add falling fish bones from death point
Begun testing with game state manager architecture (not in the repo yet) -- will hopefully have done next update
Probably a lot more I forgot, check the diffs :D

task.summary:
Added fish personality types: Neutral, Timid, Friendly, and Bubble Chaser. Each have set rules that dictate behavior in the tank.
Added bubbles for decoration and as targets for bubble chaser
TODO: Implement food chasing behavior as specified in personality descriptions
Use sprites instead of pygame rects
Implement mechanism to determine which way a fish is facing
Smooth out wandering movement so it isn't as jittery

Added tank graphics
Fixed fish behavior
Fixed fish pathing
Added some sound effects
General optimizations and improvements

Added sand floor
Changed shadows to allow drawing on sand floor
Fixed fish behavior
Redesigned Fish class and subclasses
Added several sound effects (CREDITS IN README)
Added death from starvation TODO: add falling fish bones from death point
Begun testing with game state manager architecture (not in the repo yet) -- will hopefully have done next update
Probably a lot more I forgot, check the diffs :D
